titleStmt.title: A cure for the tongue-evill, or, A receipt against vain oaths being a plain and profitable poem, shewing the hainousness of common swearing, with reasons against it, and remedies for it / by T.I., an hearty well-wisher to his king, church, and country.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: Written by T. Jordan. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
